Package com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Components for App Inventor runtime library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RaspberryPiMessageListener
    Callback interface for receiving messages through the MQTT protocol.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RaspberryPiMessagingService
    The service that handles the communication between the clients and the brokers using the MQTT protocol.
    RaspberryPiPinClient
    Non-visible component that models any device attached to a GPIO pin of the RaspberryPi, such as a sensor or an output device such as an LED.
    RaspberryPiServer
    Non-visible component that models the Raspberry Pi and can act as the MQTT broker that relays messages between the RaspberryPiPinClients and other external sources.
